no_idea.SUBTITLE: But not for long!
no_idea.desc: You are looking for new ideas, to solve a problem, to find new business.... to whatever. You have already used different methods for ideation. We propose you a 3 hours-session with the IdeaMaker and StormBoard toolkit from our partner Nod-A to think differently, rationalize your idea choice and prepare your first pitch.

scale.TOOLTIP: You are ready to scale up
scale.SUBTITLE: You are ready to scale up
scale.desc: All trafic lights are green, you are ready to grow and you need additional funds. How? we are working on it

lost.TOOLTIP: You are lost in the innovation ecosystem
lost.SUBTITLE: Find your path in innovation galaxy

an_idea.SUBTITLE: You have an idea and want to shoot for the stars
an_idea.desc:
You have a breaking new idea !?
No, you have a pretty good idea !?
Either you just have a problem ?

Anyway, just contact the DreamCatchers team... and let’s pitch 5 minutes with 10 minutes Q&A.
A facilitators team to help you go to the next level of your idea and let's the dream come true.

We offer you the possibility to have a film of your 1st pitch.


You are idea is great, you are sure of that. Hummm… we propose you to test your Why… and build your path, step by step to your North Star during a 2-hours session. Be ready for your first Pivot!

offer.TOOLTIP: You want to offer a product or service
offer.SUBTITLE: Align to your clients
offer.desc: You want to offer a product or service that is in adequation with your clients needs. Back to basics you may think. Yes, it is but it is a quick and efficient way to check your value proposition. On one side the customer jobs, pains and gains, on the other side the product or service offer with the pains relievers and gain creators. We help you to identify these elements with Strategyzer detailed approach.

challenge.TOOLTIP: You want to challenge your concept
challenge.SUBTITLE: You want to challenge your concept, so test, test and test again
challenge.desc:
The path to the success is based on your abilities to know your market, your customers.
You build value proposition a concept or a service based on assumptions.
Now transform your assumptions to assertions !

And tackle the sooner the critical part of your business plan.

We propose sessions to identify and rank your assumptions using a simple assumptions matrix and package appropriate tests.
Depending on your case, we rely on the Experiencers community, users, clients or prospects.

business.TOOLTIP: You are ready to define your business model
business.SUBTITLE: Ready to define your business model, zoom out from your value proposition to ecosystem
business.desc: Draw your Environment Map to undersand the environment in which you create. Build your Canvas, case by case to find the appropriate business model(s). We help you assess business model(s) with a questionning approach inspired by Strategyzer.

mvp.SUBTITLE: You want to say "hello world", prototype for real!
mvp.desc:
Objective to make things concrete by giving reality to your value proposition.
Your Minimum Value Proposition or Product is unique and we are ready to taylor made our facilitation around it. But to get your basic first prototype very quicly, we are proposing to re-use experienced and efficient methodology such as Landing page, App[M]aker by Nod-A.

funds.SUBTITLE: You want to raise funds, so story tell your idea!
funds.desc: To find Angels ready to invest in your idea, your pitch is a major step. First, we help you to assess if it is time to go pitching. To get ready, we propose collective pitch training session in collaboration with improv theatre workshops, individual coaching and also enablers, Pitch[M}otion or Stor[m]board by Nod-A. To get inspired, we propose a TEDTalks library.

sell.TOOLTIP: You want to sell to clients
sell.SUBTITLE: You want to sell to clients, market it!
sell.desc: You know your market, your clients, your target, let's move to operational marketing and build your mix marketing and marketing plan.From the 4Ps, 4Cs to the 10Ps.

align.TOOLTIP: Keep align with client expectations and your business model
align.SUBTITLE: Keep align with client expectations and your business model
align.desc: Create, Measure and Learn to improve your model and progress step by step. Follow the performance to adapt to changes
